question: Which of the following was the leader of Bardoli Satyagrah?
explanation: In February 1926, Vallabh Bhai Patel was called to lead the Bardoli Satyagrah. The title of “Sardar” was given by the women of Bardoli. Under Patel, the Bardoli peasants resolved to refuse payments of the revised assessment until the Government appointed an independent tribunal or accepted the current amount as full payment.
